name: faster-react-tabs
description: A faster React tab component that doesn't use DOM refs. Written in ES6, transpiles down to ES5

scripts.build: rm -Rf dist/ && mkdir dist && webpack --optimize-minimize --progress --colors && cp example/index.html dist/ && cp example/bundle.min.js dist/ && node-sass --output-style compressed example/scss/index.scss example/css/index.css && mkdir -p dist/css && cp example/css/* dist/css/

author: edenspiekermann
